procedure.step:
&CAWS-console-signin;
Navigate to the project where you want to create a repository.

step.para: In the side navigation menu, choose Code, and then choose Repositories.

In Repository name, provide a name for the repository. Optionally add a description for the repository in Description that will help other users in the project understand what the repository is used for. We recommend adding a template readme markdown to the repository by selecting the Initialize with README file. This option will also create an initial commit for the repository in a default branch named main. Optionally choose to add a .gitignore file for the type of code you plan to push. Choose Create repository.
